snippet.title: Hurricane Pack 2 is Back! | NINJA GAIDEN (2004) Prototype
snippet.description:
Nearing the anniversary of what I consider my first Ninja Gaiden mod video, which also involved NINJA GAIDEN 2004 and the Hurricane Packs, comes an incredible development! Thanks to the amazing people at the Hidden Palace and Project Deluge [https://hiddenpalace.org/Project_Deluge_-_Microsoft_Xbox_(List)] and the astute ninja Deyrax, we can play Eternal Legend AKA Hurricane Pack 2 from the very beginning!

*NO RELIANCE ON OLD SAVE FILES.*
*NO XBOX LIVE CONNECTION.*
*NO PREDETERMINED STARTING KARMA SCORE.*

Thanks to the Hidden Palace, this is just like how it was in 2005, except no internet is required! You just need a soft-modded Xbox so you can transfer the game files to your console over FTP. This does not appear to work on Xemu yet, but give the community time and not only will we have that figured out, but we will also figure out how to get Hurricane Pack 1 working 100%--because, truth be told, HP1 *already works,* but there is an odd glitch when you interact with Muramasa statues that crashes the game. As I said, we'll have these things figured out soon, but in the meantime, please enjoy some fresh, brand-new Hurricane Pack 2 content.

INTERCEPT IS BACK AGAIN, BABY.


Join over 600 fellow NG fans at the GG Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ge3hFpT
